content.description: The diameter, in centimeters (<math alttext="c m" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>cm</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>), of each tree in a random sample of trees in a forest was measured. The histogram shown summarizes the diameters.
content.question: Which of the following is the best description of the distribution?

choices.label: The distribution consists of two clusters and a gap.
The distribution is symmetric with a skew to the right.
The distribution is skewed to the left.

content.answer: The distribution consists of two clusters and a gap.

topic.text: 1.6: Describing the Distribution of a Quantitative Variable

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe data presented numerically or graphically.
